dc_title_s: To the right honourable Charles, Earl of Peterborow and Monmouth, &c this map of Africa ... is most humbly dedicated / by your Lordship’s humble servant H: Moll geographer.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Shows portion of Brazil. Prime meridians: London and Ferro. "According to the newest and most exact observations." "Printed for H. Moll over against Devereux Court without Temple Bar, Ino. Bowles print and map seller over against Stocks Mt and Tho. Bowles print and mapseller next to the chapter house in St. Pauls church yard ... " Includes views of "Cape Coast Castle on ye gold coast of Guinea," "James Fort on the island of St. Helena," and "A prospect of the Cape of Good Hope," and a plan of the Fort of Good Hope.
dc_publisher_s: [London] near St. Dunstan's Church, Fleetstreet : Printed ... by Philip Overton, map and printseller, [1710]
